Sections.title: Welcome
Sections.content:
The Curriculum Vitae of Joe Buckle

I have 10+ years experience in website and application development.
In this time I have developed experience in:

  • PHP
  • Python
  • JavaScript
  • MySQL
  • WordPress
  • Laravel
  • Linux
  • ...loads of other stuff

My job role is Full Stack Developer which means that I am comfortable working on all parts of the stack but I do not excel in any one area.

This CV is built using React + Redux with Material UI as a component library.

You can edit this if you want and even play Breakout
(try and get a top score!).
